item.title: mazzo.li — blag — Remote, encrypted ZFS storage server with NixOS
item.description: I explain how to remotely setup a storage server with full disk encryption. The server is rented from [Hetzner](https://www.hetzner.com/), and many of the details are specific to Hetzner. The system is configured with [NixOS](https://nixos.org/), survives up to one disk failure, and is easy to operate without physical access to the machine. After setup we test the monitoring and redundancy of the server through a variety of tests.
item.author: (Francesco Mazzoli <f@mazzo.li>)
